lore: This monster lives in a desert northeast of Rodia called the Bronze Sea, which is four times bigger than the country and separates it from the other nations of the continent. The Bilemaw has a tail with markings in the shape of eyes, and when confronted by another of these creatures for its territory, it stretches the skin around these markings as much as possible. Whoever has the smallest eyes will leave the area without violence. In the event of a tie, each one will dig a tunnel of approximately one mile in length and then have a race to decide the winer.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Bilemaw
